MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 11-NOV-2020 19:50.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the WA9 postcode area of St. Helens, affecting properties in Broad Oak Road, Pennine Drive and surrounding streets. We became aware of this network issue at 5:45pm. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:02pm on 11th November 2020.
